name: Santhanu Vinod
mainSummary: Maintainer of GitLab's vSphere fleeting plugin and contributor to Gitaly (Git RPC service). Building event-driven systems with Kafka, saga patterns, and event sourcing in production.
subSummary: Demonstrated Go proficiency through maintained OSS tooling and merged contributions to one of the largest Go codebases. Seeking remote Go distributed systems roles.

experiences.description: Software engineer building reliable distributed systems, backend services, and cloud infrastructure. Professionally experienced in .NET, focused on event-driven architectures, scalable service design, and cloud-native patterns.
achievements: Implemented event sourcing with MongoDB, storing full snapshots and calculating deltas between them for analytics and tracking
Designed and maintained a distributed mail service using Kafka, PostgreSQL, and MailKit, supporting multiple backend providers with secure credential management
Architected and integrated WorkflowCore orchestration, enabling complex distributed workflows with saga patterns and custom retry mechanisms
Integrated Keycloak-based user access management for multi-tenant environments, ensuring secure gRPC inter-service communication
Secured and optimized Azure-based SaaS deployments through VNet segmentation, private endpoints, and Function App integrations while managing cost efficiency
Delivered backend APIs and frontends leveraging schema-driven development with MongoDB and PostgreSQL, supporting advanced business rule validations
Containerized and orchestrated backend services with Docker to streamline deployments and ensure environment consistency
Developed and managed GitLab CI/CD pipelines with multi-stage deployments, reducing manual release overhead and improving delivery speed

education.description: Focused on foundational computer science concepts, distributed algorithms, and systems design, preparing for a career in backend and distributed systems engineering.

ossMaintained.name: GitLab Runner Fleeting Plugin for VMware vSphere

Actively maintained the plugin with bug fixes and responded to community contributions
Officially listed in GitLab documentation as a community-supported plugin, establishing credibility in the OSS ecosystem

ossContributed.name: GitLab Gitaly

Explored AST-based top-down approach for config documentation generation, improving maintainability
Proposed and implemented Git refs verification in housekeeping with Prometheus metrics, enhancing monitoring and reliability
